[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

The Blackmagic Pocket Cinema cameras allow you to capture 4k or 6k videos using our Digital SLR Adapter. They can record the captured videos to an SD card or external hard drive.

  • Micro 4/3 or Super 35 sensor sizes
  • Records in 4k or 6k resolution depending on camera
  • 10 bit High Dynamic Range (HDR)
  • SD card or external hard drive recording
  • Full-sized HDMI live video output
  • Compatible with our Digital SLR adapter

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72825,72826″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574804025375{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Blackmagic Pocket Cinema

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

The Blackmagic Pocket Cinema is an option that is becoming increasingly popular for our customers to capture Ultra HD video. With both 4k and 6k HDR options these cameras have the potential to capture the highest quality video using our adapters. With SD card, HDMI and external drive support these cameras have plenty of power and potential for power users.

Both cameras are compatible with our Digital SLR adapter.

The full specifications for the Blackmagic Pocket Cinema 4k can be found here.
The full specifications for the Blackmagic Pocket Cinema 6k can be found here.

Sample videos can be found on our YouTube page.

Part #’s BMD-CINECAMPOCHDMFT4K & BMD-CINECAMPOCHDEF6K

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54c183-321b”][vc_column_text]

Compatible with our Digital SLR Adapter

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dc183-321b”][vc_column_text]

Blackmagic cameras are not medical devices. They are used with our adapters which are class 1 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014ac183-321b”][vc_column_text]

Blackmagic products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
